description: Setup quota and dispatchers for Spark batch and streaming workloads

run.cmd: cd $MESOS_SANDBOX; git clone https://github.com/mesosphere/spark-build.git; cd spark-build/; python3 -m venv test-env; pip3 install -r tests/requirements.txt; dcos cluster setup https://master.mesos --username=$DCOS_UID --password=$DCOS_PASSWORD --no-check; cd scale-tests/; python3 deploy-dispatchers.py --docker-image $DOCKER_IMAGE --quota-dispatcher-cpus $QUOTA_DISPATCHER_CPUS --quota-dispatcher-mem $QUOTA_DISPATCHER_MEM --quota-driver-cpus $QUOTA_DRIVER_CPUS --quota-driver-mem $QUOTA_DRIVER_MEM $NUM_DISPATCHERS $SERVICE_BASE_NAME $OUTPUT_FILE
